Package semsim.fileaccessors

Class JSimProjectAccessor

java.lang.Object
semsim.fileaccessors.ModelAccessor
semsim.fileaccessors.JSimProjectAccessor
public class JSimProjectAccessor
extends ModelAccessor
Class containing functions for accessing the model contents within a JSim project file

mneal

  • Method Details

    • modelInStream

      public java.io.InputStream modelInStream() throws java.io.IOException
      Creates an InputStream for the model in the project file
      Overrides:
      modelInStream in class ModelAccessor
      Returns:
      The model text as an InputStream (only for locally-stored models)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getFullPathToModel

      public java.lang.String getFullPathToModel()
      Overrides:
      getFullPathToModel in class ModelAccessor
      Returns:
      The path to the model file. If the model is in an archive or a JSim project file, the path takes the form [path to archive/.proj file]#[name of model]. Otherwise, this returns the same path as getFilePath().

    • getShortLocation

      public java.lang.String getShortLocation()
      Overrides:
      getShortLocation in class ModelAccessor
      Returns:
      If the model is in a standalone file, the name of the file is returned otherwise a string with format [name of archive] > [name of model] is returned

    • getModelName

      public java.lang.String getModelName()
      Overrides:
      getModelName in class ModelAccessor
      Returns:
      The name of the model in the project file that the JSimProjectAccessor points to

    • getModelType

      public ModelClassifier.ModelType getModelType()
      Overrides:
      getModelType in class ModelAccessor
      Returns:
      The type of model pointed to by the JSimProjectAccessor
